subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets filled their need for a potent left-handed hitter off the bench by acquiring the veteran outfielder Ricky Ledee off waivers from the Los Angeles Dodgers.
snippet: The Mets filled their need for a potent left-handed hitter off the bench by acquiring the veteran outfielder Ricky Ledee off waivers from the Los Angeles Dodgers.
